item.description:
Thanks to Fred for suggesting this great idea for tomorrow.

Let's get together and kickoff the beginning of the holiday season and a maybe a toast for my new collaboration and business venture.

 Why not meet around 4:30 at Lucky's - - - since they are renovating their kitchen, they are offering an assortment of free apps.  

Join us for a cocktail at our favorite Boston spot.

AND did you read this from Best of Boston 2011:

Best of Boston 2011: Bar, Lounge Lucky's Lounge A lounge used to be a place where you could mingle with strangers and tie one on at any time of day. Now it’s usually just home to overdressed scenesters and overpriced drinks. But Lucky’s is a throwback to the glory days. A speakeasy-style bar with dim lighting, vintage leather booths, and walls covered in Rat Pack photos, it’s an ode to the three-martini lunch era.

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: Meetup at Lucky's - Last Minute
